title: Incorrect dataimport handler package name in SolrResourceLoader
description: "packages" String array used by findClass method in SolrResourceLoader has value for dataimport handler package as "handler.dataimport", must be "handler.dataimport."

comments.author: Shalin Shekhar Mangar
comments.content:
Committed revision 890243.

Thanks for the catch Akshay!
